channel.title: Anti-dupe system
channel.description: well i'm looking for a good anti-dupe system for my server right now i have a 317 and some people are duping with double screen if you got a good anti-dupe system i will really appreciate it thank you and also it would be a great help if you tell me where in the server should i add this file

item.title: Anti-dupe system
item.dc:creator: @asdjf asdjf
item.description:
@asdjf wrote:

if(interfaceID == 7423) { bankItem(removeID, removeSlot, 1);openUpDepBox(); } else if (interfaceID == 5064) { // remove from bag to bank bankItem(removeID, removeSlot, 1); } else if (interfaceID == 5382) { // remove from bank fromBank(removeID, removeSlot, 1); } else if (interfaceID == 3322) { if ((removeID == (playerItems[removeSlot] -1)) && (removeID > 0)){ // Trade Dupe fix by Gdog284 (www.Gdogscape.webs.com) tradeItem(removeID, removeSlot, 1); } else { yell("[REPORT] " + playerName + " & client-" + trade_other + " tried to Trade dupe " + getItemName(removeID) + "."); } }

that wont give compile errors

Read full topic

item.title: Anti-dupe system
item.dc:creator: @duffy12345678910 duffy12345678910
item.description:
@duffy12345678910 wrote:

[quote=“jj0001, post:4, topic:317265”][quote author=duffy12345678910 link=topic=413810.msg3048451#msg3048451 date=1259947220]

Add this in client.java under case 145. It will fix trading & banking & report to a moderator, admin or owner when they try and trade the duped item.

[code]if(interfaceID == 7423) {

			bankItem(removeID, removeSlot, 1);openUpDepBox();
		} else if (interfaceID == 5064) {
			// remove from bag to bank
			bankItem(removeID, removeSlot, 1);
		} else if (interfaceID == 5382) {
			// remove from bank
			fromBank(removeID, removeSlot, 1);
		} else if (interfaceID == 3322) {
            if ((removeID == (playerItems[removeSlot] -1)) && (removeID > 0)){ // Trade Dupe fix by Gdog284 (www.Gdogscape.webs.com)
                tradeItem(removeID, removeSlot, 1);
            } else {
                modYell("[REPORT] " + playerName + " & client-" + trade_other + " tried to Trade dupe " + getItemName(removeID) + ".");
            }[/code]

lolz can you explain under what code to add cuzz i got same problem and dont wanna post question cuzz its 5 questions about duping under eachother
[/quote]read the first few words he says to put in client.java under case 145.[/quote]

yeah but i get like 3-5 errors

Read full topic

item.title: Anti-dupe system
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“duffy12345678910, post:3, topic:317265”][quote author=Owner_Of_GdogScape link=topic=413810.msg3048340#msg3048340 date=1259940222]
Add this in client.java under case 145. It will fix trading & banking & report to a moderator, admin or owner when they try and trade the duped item.

if(interfaceID == 7423) { bankItem(removeID, removeSlot, 1);openUpDepBox(); } else if (interfaceID == 5064) { // remove from bag to bank bankItem(removeID, removeSlot, 1); } else if (interfaceID == 5382) { // remove from bank fromBank(removeID, removeSlot, 1); } else if (interfaceID == 3322) { if ((removeID == (playerItems[removeSlot] -1)) && (removeID > 0)){ // Trade Dupe fix by Gdog284 (www.Gdogscape.webs.com) tradeItem(removeID, removeSlot, 1); } else { modYell("[REPORT] " + playerName + " & client-" + trade_other + " tried to Trade dupe " + getItemName(removeID) + "."); }
[/quote]

lolz can you explain under what code to add cuzz i got same problem and dont wanna post question cuzz its 5 questions about duping under eachother[/quote]read the first few words he says to put in client.java under case 145.

Read full topic

if(interfaceID == 7423) { bankItem(removeID, removeSlot, 1);openUpDepBox(); } else if (interfaceID == 5064) { // remove from bag to bank bankItem(removeID, removeSlot, 1); } else if (interfaceID == 5382) { // remove from bank fromBank(removeID, removeSlot, 1); } else if (interfaceID == 3322) { if ((removeID == (playerItems[removeSlot] -1)) && (removeID > 0)){ // Trade Dupe fix by Gdog284 (www.Gdogscape.webs.com) tradeItem(removeID, removeSlot, 1); } else { modYell("[REPORT] " + playerName + " & client-" + trade_other + " tried to Trade dupe " + getItemName(removeID) + "."); }[/quote]

item.title: Anti-dupe system
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Of_GdogScape Owner_Of_GdogScape
item.description:
@Owner_Of_GdogScape wrote:

Add this in client.java under case 145. It will fix trading & banking & report to a moderator, admin or owner when they try and trade the duped item.

if(interfaceID == 7423) { bankItem(removeID, removeSlot, 1);openUpDepBox(); } else if (interfaceID == 5064) { // remove from bag to bank bankItem(removeID, removeSlot, 1); } else if (interfaceID == 5382) { // remove from bank fromBank(removeID, removeSlot, 1); } else if (interfaceID == 3322) { if ((removeID == (playerItems[removeSlot] -1)) && (removeID > 0)){ // Trade Dupe fix by Gdog284 (www.Gdogscape.webs.com) tradeItem(removeID, removeSlot, 1); } else { modYell("[REPORT] " + playerName + " & client-" + trade_other + " tried to Trade dupe " + getItemName(removeID) + "."); }

Read full topic

item.title: Anti-dupe system
item.dc:creator: @skoal_citrus skoal citrus
item.description:
@skoal_citrus wrote:

well i’m looking for a good anti-dupe system for my server
